pages.text: The Map Atlas is a tool that allows you to store and dynamically view drawn maps of the world around you. The atlas is practically a minimap with an included world map allowing for a realistic implementation of a map in the game.

Craft yourself an atlas to use the minimap feature. Adds maps to it by placing them both in the crafting grid. Your cordinates and current biome will be shown as a tooltip below the map and if you aquire a calendar you can see the current season.
